root.name: Freddi Fish 3: The Case of the Stolen Conch Shell
root.description: Freddi Fish 3 is a game centered around Freddi Fish and his friend Luther. They discover that the conch shell has been stolen and they search for clues to find the culprit. The game uses a simplified version of the SCUMM engine like Humongous' other popular game series', Spy Fox and Pajama Sam. The culprit in the game changes every time you play it.
